name: Apollo
printed_effect:
When you Cast this Apollo you can Enchant up
to {solar}{solar}{solar} to it. You can Disenchant {solar} from this
Apollo in order to Foretell 3 and add up to 1 {solar}
Elestral Foretold this way to your hand.
effect: When you Cast this Apollo you can Enchant up to {solar}{solar}{solar} to it. You can Disenchant {solar} from this Apollo in order to Foretell 3 and add up to 1 {solar} Elestral revealed this way to your hand.
